New Records: Colombia extended their unbeaten run to 24 matches with a 2-1 victory over Paraguay
Key Match Events: Daniel Muñoz scored the opening goal in the 32nd minute
Jefferson Lerma scored the second goal with a header from James Rodríguez's free-kick
Julio Enciso scored Paraguay's lone goal in the 69th minute
VAR denied Colombia a penalty after Gustavo Velázquez appeared to foul Yerry Mina
Pre-Game Insights: James Rodríguez was pivotal with two assists
Colombia's captain emphasized the importance of the win against a tough opponent
Post-Match Reflections: Colombia's players expressed confidence in their performance and tournament prospects
Paraguay struggled to create chances in the second half
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at NRG Stadium in Houston, Texas
Both teams will face new opponents in the next round of the tournament
Others: The game was Colombia's ninth consecutive win since March 2022
The attendance was 67,059 fans at the match
